long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BU only allows students to add convenience points in increments of $25 - v stupid.  Add what you'd like in $1.00 increments.  Make it rain funny money.

 * install the extension

 * Log onto student link and purchase some points
   (https://www.bu.edu/link/bin/uiscgi_studentlink.pl/1262880963?ModuleName=menu.pl&NewMenu=Food)

  * Notice that you are now able to purchase anywhere form $1.00 -allowed amount per semester in increments of $1.00

  Its just funny money right? ;)
